tit.j: 京都賞思想・芸術部門
tit.e: Kyoto Prize in the category of Art and Philosophy
Kyoto Prize in the Category of Arts and Philosophy
tit.cmt: タイトルのため頭文字を大文字に変更、Art→Artsに修正 (参照: http://www.inamori-f.or.jp/e_kp_out_out.html)
tit.e: Kyoto Prize in the Category of Arts and Philosophy

sen.j: 京都賞思想・芸術部門（きょうとしょうしそう・げいじゅつぶもん）は、京都賞の一部門であり、優れた業績を上げた芸術家や思想家に与えられる賞である。
sen.e: The Kyoto Prize in the category of Art and Philosophy is a prize awarded to an artist or philosopher for outstanding achievements in his or her respective field.
The Kyoto Prize in the category of Arts and Philosophy is a prize awarded to an artist or philosopher for outstanding achievements in his or her respective field.
The Kyoto Prize in the category of Arts and Philosophy is a prize awarded to an artist or philosopher for outstanding achievements in his or her respective field.

sen.j: 受賞対象分野は、「音楽」、「美術」、「映画・演劇」、「思想・倫理」の四分野。
sen.e: The fields covered by this category include the four fields of "Music", "Fine Art", "Film and the Dramatic Arts", and "Philosophy/Theory".
The fields covered by this category include the four fields of 'Music,' 'Fine Art,' 'Film and the Dramatic Arts,' and 'Philosophy/Theory.'
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更、カンマ・ピリオドの位置を移動
sen.e: The fields covered by this category include the four fields of 'Music,' 'Fine Art,' 'Film and the Dramatic Arts,' and 'Philosophy/Theory.'

sen.j: 受賞者には賞状とメダル、そして賞金5000万円が贈られる。
sen.e: The recepient of the prize is awarded a certificate and medal, as well as a purse of 50 million yen.
The recepient of the prize is awarded a certificate and medal, as well as a purse of 50 million yen.
The recepient of the prize is awarded a certificate and medal, as well as a cash prize of 50 million yen.

sen.j: 受賞の対象となる分野は毎年変わり、四年で全分野を一周する。
sen.e: The field for which the prize is awarded changes every year, with the prize being awarded to each of the four respective fields once every four years.
The field for which the prize is awarded changes every year, with the prize being awarded to each of the four respective fields once every four years.
The field for which the prize is awarded changes every year, with the prize being awarded to each of the four respective fields once every four years.

tit.j: 京都賞思想・芸術部門受賞者

Recepients of the Kyoto Prize in the category of Arts and Philosophy
